td.content: s:patient presents with 5 weeks history of severe easy fatigability. patient also reports severe dyspnea, severe lethargy, Blood. pt is a 32 yo white female novelist. drinks daily she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 60 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, CBC with Manual Differential present,Hct=25 %,Hgb= 7 g/dL, Reticulocyte count Reticulocyte Percent=14 %, Echocardiogram shows calcified aortic valve a:Hemolytic Anemia p:administered azathioprine - 100 mg daily, performed CBC with Manual Differential, Reticulocyte count, Echocardiogram, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe dyspnea x 4 weeks. pt also complains of severe lethargy, severe easy fatigability. she is a white f novelist aged 33 Ys. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past she does not smoke o:Height 61 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, US Abdomen shows splenomegaly a:Hemolytic Anemia p:administered azathioprine - 100 mg daily, performed US Abdomen, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
